programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Anak Ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Dapat Ka Bang Mahalin?
programme.desc: The story, which was based on a popular comic’s serial, closely resembled what would later happen in real life to local moviedom's favorite couple. Sharon and Gabby portrayed teenagers who eloped and got married against the advice of everybody.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Sobra-Sobra, Labis-Labis
programme.desc: Pinay, a young and fragile lass whose vulnerability was exploited by her stepfather who was ne'er-do-well scattergood while Tisay, a perceptive flesh vending streetsmart whose openness to things around her made her an interesting character study for a new-sprung writer.

programme.title: Dos Bravos
programme.desc: Pancho (Niño Muhlach) is travelling from one town to the next in the hope of finding his long lost father. His only clue is a handkerchief embroidered with an emblem of Hacienda BM. Later, Pancho ask the help of Valdes (Dante Varona).

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Wooly Booly (Ang Classmate Kong Alien)
programme.desc: Wooly Booly was an alien stranded on earth. A family took him in and a request to his superiors from another planet granted him an almost human appearance.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Sumigaw Ka Hanggang Gusto Mo
programme.desc: Five murdered students, One terrified survivor, One mysterious killer on the loose.
